content: Intelligence is the ability to understand complex ideas, to adapt effectively to the environment, to learn from experience, to engage in various forms of reasoning, and to overcome obstacles.
translations: ita:L'intelligenza è la capacità di comprendere idee complesse, di adattarsi efficacemente all'ambiente, di apprendere dall'
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
